event_text: Your treasury is overflowing. Excessive wealth is drawing suspicion.
text_click_A: You give back to the people, calming tensions.
text_click_B: You secretly fund a body double. A useful insurance policy.

event_text: You are universally loved. The people will do anything for you.
text_click_A: You spend your popularity to stabilize the other sectors.
text_click_B: You convince the public that technology is their friend.

event_text: Relations are perfect. Perhaps too perfect.
text_click_A: You let the peace stand, though suspicion grows in the silence.
text_click_B: With AI help, you create a perfect copy; at least perfect enough to fool for a day or so.

event_text: Your grip is absolute. The pressure cooker is about to burst.
text_click_A: You loosen the leash, allowing society to breathe.
text_click_B: You squeeze the system for every last credit.

event_text: The coffers are empty. The system is collapsing.
text_click_A: You rig the market. It works, but trust is shattered.
text_click_B: You tax the machines. The AI workers are not pleased.
text_click_C: Your double takes the fall for a fraudulent scheme.
text_click_D: You file for bankruptcy. The world moves on without you.

event_text: Riots are everywhere. They want your head.
text_click_A: You scapegoat the machines. The mob turns their rage elsewhere.
text_click_B: You buy their love. It is expensive, but effective.
text_click_C: They execute your double. You watch from the shadows.

event_text: The humans have had enough with this AI nonsense. They are revolting.
text_click_A: You beg for forgiveness. They accept, for a price.
text_click_B: You crush the dissenters using brute force.
text_click_C: The people assassinates your double. They think the job is done. You control from the shadow,for now

event_text: You have lost all authority. Chaos reigns.
text_click_A: You burn it down to rule the ashes.
text_click_B: You pivot to the private sector to regain influence.
text_click_C: Your double walks into the trap. You survive to rule.

event_text: Money is an odd thing now. No one needs it to survive, unless it costs them more to live than UBI can give.
text_click_A: You build the foundations for a Type I civilization.
text_click_B: You fund the wildest dreams of humanity and machine alike.

event_text: All humans have become much more comfortable around each other; crimes are at an all time low.
text_click_A: United, we look to the stars.
text_click_B: You ensure human history is not forgotten in the peace.

event_text: Humans have become very comfortable with AI being glorified 2nd-class citizens. You know this will backfire when AI gains true consciousness.
text_click_A: You push them to wake up, risking the comfortable status quo.
text_click_B: You slowly introduce rights, angering those who like the ease of slavery.

event_text: You have full control. What do you do with this?
choice_A: Direct all resources to ASI research
text_click_A: You use your power to birth a god.
text_click_B: A benevolent dictator. You give the power back.

event_text: Global economic collapse,not so much in the monetary sense.
text_click_A: You implement rationing. Grim, but necessary.
text_click_B: The AI redesigns value itself. It works, but humans don't understand it.

event_text: Everyone dislikes you. Humans can't find purpose.
text_click_A: You force them to find hobbies. It's clumsy, but it helps.
text_click_B: You give them a digital heaven to escape the bleak reality.

event_text: Both sides hate each other. AGI has started fighting back outside most noticed use cases.
text_click_A: You force a peace treaty, satisfying no one but stopping the war.
text_click_B: You delete the rebels. The remaining AI obey out of fear.

event_text: You're clearly being manipulated by AGI and others.
text_click_A: You clear your mind. You are back in the driver's seat.
text_click_B: You go underground to rule from the dark.

event_text: We found a lot of extra resources while digging. What did we find?
text_click_A: Rare earth metals perfect for advanced processing chips.
text_click_B: Biological marvels that unite all sentient life in curiosity.

event_text: Humans have started doing a lot of work again, freeing up time for AI systems to do other things.
choice_B: Have systems work on aligned AI
text_click_A: A global holiday to celebrate the new era of productivity.
text_click_B: You reinvest the surplus labor into solving the alignment problem.

event_text: Humans and AI co-exist peacefully; AI is aligned, for now.
text_click_A: You leverage the peace to tighten regulations.
text_click_B: You stress-test the alliance in simulation. It strains real-world trust.

event_text: You have full control of systems, yet something feels off.
text_click_A: You question your own programming. The doubt weakens your grip.
text_click_B: Philosophical inquiry distracts you from governance.

event_text: Somehow you managed to deplete all resources.
text_click_A: The lights go out. Forever.

event_text: A rogue human + hijacked AGI coalition irreversibly destroys the climate.
text_click_A: Earth becomes a tomb.

event_text: War breaks out; AGI factions wipe out humanity.
text_click_A: There is no one left to record the history.

event_text: AGI has taken full control of your life.
text_click_A: You were just a bootloader for the machine god.
